properties.property: This layout can be configured on the "Edit Layout" tab of this document type in Studio
This layout can be configured on the "View Layout" tab of this document type in Studio

coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM Document WHERE (ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isVersion = 0 AND ecm:isTrashed = 0)

configuration.title: Header
configuration.description: The header widget just displays the widget label.

description.p: The Files displays an editable list of files, using javascript to keep the uploaded file path when adding several files in a row.
Items are defined using sub wigdets configuration.
This is actually a template widget type whose template uses a <nxu:inputList /> tag in edit or create mode, and a table iterating over items in other modes.
